article.title: Status and history for Pulaar [fuv]
article.para: No known problems at this time.

history.history-entry: OHCHR identifies the language as Peuhl and credits the translation to Minist√®re de l'Education Nationale, Guinea. Therefore, the language must be Pulaar (ISO 639-3 'fuc', not 'fuv'). Changed accordingly. Thanks to Adam Twardoch.
stage 4: conversion to Unicode, thanks to Eric Muller.
stage 2: OHCHR identified as the source.
